attributes.action: Ensure ALL potholes are filled as soon as they become apparent!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help to get London's roads filled as there are waaay too many potholes about and has already caused me a flat tyre, almost getting in an accident and almost damage to my car.  Potholes ARE DANGEROUS and should be sorted asap!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
